faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about RavenSaas
faq.moreQuestions: More questions? Contact us on Discord or via email.

what.question: What is RavenSaas and how does it work?
what.answer: RavenSaas is a comprehensive NextJS boilerplate designed for building AI SaaS startups. It provides ready-made templates, infrastructure setup, and deployment tools to help you launch your AI business in hours, not days.

skills.question: Do I need advanced technical skills to use RavenSaas?
skills.answer: While basic programming knowledge is helpful, RavenSaas is designed to be developer-friendly. Our templates and documentation make it easy to get started even if you're not an expert in AI or cloud infrastructure.

types.question: What types of AI SaaS can I build with RavenSaas?
types.answer: RavenSaas supports a wide range of AI applications, from content generation to data analysis tools. Our templates cover popular use cases such as AI chatbots, content generators, image processing applications, and more.

time.question: How long does it typically take to launch using RavenSaas?
time.answer: With RavenSaas, you can have a working prototype in hours and a production-ready application in days. Our one-click deployments and pre-configured infrastructure significantly reduce the development cycle that traditionally takes months.

infrastructure.question: What does the RavenSaas infrastructure include?
infrastructure.answer: RavenSaas provides a complete infrastructure stack including authentication, database setup, API integrations, payment processing, and scalable cloud deployment. Everything is pre-configured according to industry best practices.

customization.question: Can I customize the templates to match my brand?
customization.answer: Absolutely! All RavenSaas templates are fully customizable. You can modify designs, features, and functionality to match your brand identity and specific business requirements while maintaining the robust underlying infrastructure.

support.title: Still have questions?
support.description: Our support team is here to help

testimonial.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonial.subtitle: Hear from satisfied customers who have built successful products with RavenSaas

user1.name: John Doe
user1.title: Founder & CEO, TechStart
user1.content: RavenSaas cut our development time in half. We were able to focus on our core product features instead of spending weeks setting up infrastructure.

user2.name: Sarah Johnson
user2.title: CTO, AIVentures
user2.content: The pre-built components and authentication system saved us months of development. The code quality is excellent and the documentation is comprehensive.

user3.name: Michael Chang
user3.title: Solo Developer
user3.content: As a solo developer, RavenSaas gave me everything I needed to launch my SaaS in record time. Customer support has been fantastic whenever I had questions.
